reg_pit.title: Civil Resolution Tribunal Small Claims Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 232/2018, effective January 1, 2019.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Civil Resolution Tribunal Small Claims Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, Act means the Civil Resolution Tribunal Act.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 3.1 (1) of the Act, the maximum tribunal small claim amount is $5 000.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Maximum deposit for claim previously adjudicated by civil resolution tribunal

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 56.3 (2) (a) of the Act, the amount prescribed is equal to the amount awarded by the civil resolution tribunal against the person.
For the purposes of section 56.3 (2) (b) of the Act, the amount prescribed is $1 000.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Civil Resolution Tribunal Act, S.B.C. 2012, c. 25, section 93]
